root.content: Define the foundational backbone architecture for HiveMind v3 - establishing hierarchical regulation and enforcement flow systems

children.content: Phase 1: Architectural Foundation Audit - Deep-scan lib/tools/hooks separation, validate Gemini findings, identify CQRS violations and architectural drift
PHASE 1: Context Recovery & Governance Reset - Analyzing 115-turn session state, validating Gemini review findings, preparing architectural deep-scan delegation to scanner/build agents
Deep-scanning src/lib/ directory for taxonomy compliance: checking for LLM prompts, natural language generation, and verifying pure deterministic TypeScript business logic
Auditing src/tools/ directory for Dumb Tool taxonomy compliance - delegating to scanner for raw file inventory
Auditing src/schemas/ directory - analyzing 8 files for Zod definitions and FK constraints
